confirmation.subject: Confirm your email address
confirmation.title: Confirm Your Email
confirmation.message: Thank you for signing up. Please confirm your email address by clicking the button below.
confirmation.alternative: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
confirmation.footer: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

magic_link.subject: Your sign-in link
magic_link.title: Sign In
magic_link.message: Click the button below to sign in to your account.
magic_link.alternative: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
magic_link.footer: This link will expire in 1 hour. If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.

password_reset.subject: Reset your password
password_reset.title: Reset Your Password
password_reset.message: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
password_reset.alternative: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
password_reset.footer: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. This link will expire in 1 hour.

email_change.subject: Confirm your new email address
email_change.title: Confirm New Email
email_change.message: You requested to change your email address. Please confirm your new email by clicking the button below.
email_change.alternative: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
email_change.footer: If you didn't request this change, please contact support immediately.

invite.subject: You've been invited
invite.title: You've Been Invited
invite.message: You've been invited to join. Click the button below to accept the invitation and set up your account.
invite.alternative: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
invite.footer: This invitation will expire in 7 days.

reauthentication.subject: Confirm your identity
reauthentication.title: Confirm Your Identity
reauthentication.message: For security purposes, please confirm your identity by clicking the button below.
reauthentication.alternative: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
reauthentication.footer: This link will expire in 1 hour.
